metadata.description: Mark Waid brings another installment of the world's greatest detective! With only six months to live, Catherine Allingham's condition is terminal. But nothing will stop her from trying to solve even more mysteries. It's international suspense and hair-raising macabre as time runs out for our detective. Interior art by superstar Minck Oosterveer. Features 2 covers which will be shipped randomly.
metadata.name: The Unknown: The Devil Made Flesh
